argumentText:
ARGUMENT
n

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_chpval | |- ( A e. RR -> ( psi ` A ) = sum_ n e. ( 1 ... ( |_ ` A ) ) ( Lam ` n ) ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( A e. RR -> ( exp ` ( psi ` A ) ) = ( exp ` sum_ n e. ( 1 ... ( |_ ` A ) ) ( Lam ` n ) ) ) |
| 3 |  | #P_fzfid | |- ( A e. RR -> ( 1 ... ( |_ ` A ) ) e. Fin ) |
| 4 |  | #P_elfznn | |- ( n e. ( 1 ... ( |_ ` A ) ) -> n e. NN ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ n e. ( 1 ... ( |_ ` A ) ) ) -> n e. NN ) |
| 6 |  | #P_vmacl | |- ( n e. NN -> ( Lam ` n ) e. RR ) |
| 7 | 5, 6 | #P_syl | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ n e. ( 1 ... ( |_ ` A ) ) ) -> ( Lam ` n ) e. RR ) |
| 8 |  | #P_efvmacl | |- ( n e. NN -> ( exp ` ( Lam ` n ) ) e. NN ) |
| 9 | 5, 8 | #P_syl | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ n e. ( 1 ... ( |_ ` A ) ) ) -> ( exp ` ( Lam ` n ) ) e. NN ) |
| 10 | 3, 7, 9 | #P_efnnfsumcl | |- ( A e. RR -> ( exp ` sum_ n e. ( 1 ... ( |_ ` A ) ) ( Lam ` n ) ) e. NN ) |
| 11 | 2, 10 | #P_eqeltrd | |- ( A e. RR -> ( exp ` ( psi ` A ) ) e. NN ) |
